entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Thursday 30 March 2023
